To access Sathyabama LMS, students and faculty members need to log in using their credentials provided by the institution. Once logged in, users can navigate to their respective courses and access the course materials and resources. https://sathyabama.cognibot.in/

SAEEE may refer to the Sathyabama All India Engineering Entrance Examination, which is a national level entrance exam conducted by the Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology for admission to undergraduate engineering courses. https://www.sathyabama.ac.in/SAEEE2023
We are providing high-level recruitement for the past few years. To know & to be included join at. https://www.sathyabama.ac.in/placements/recruitments
The University recorded a 92.64% hiring rate during placements in 2022. However, a placement rate of 91.73% was recorded in 2021.

Sathyabama is a prestigious institution which excels in the fields of Engineering, Science and  Technology for more than three successful decades. It offers multi-disciplinary academic programmes in various fields of Engineering, Science, Technology, law, Dental Science, Pharmacy, Nursing, Management, Arts and Science and Allied Health Sciences. https://www.sathyabama.ac.in/admissions
